description: Slovakia warned Austria of the gunman's failed attempt to buy bullets, but there was no follow-up.
title: Vienna attack: Austria admits failing to act on Slovak warning on gunman
title_page: Vienna attack: Austria admits failing to act on Slovak warning on gunman - BBC News
maintext: Elsewhere, Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio has called for an EU Patriot Act, along the lines of the US law which increased surveillance powers after the 9/11 attacks. "Europe and Italy itself cannot continue with just words," he said, referring to the attacks on Vienna and on Nice last week. The Nice attacker had travelled from Tunisia via Italy into the south of France.
